Dan: The Year of the Seltzer is aspirational for all. Dan will drink 500 different Seltzers by 4/20/21 and rate them, Jordan: Black cherry yogurt pairs well with Chocolate Lucky Charms if you're stir crazy
Dan: Gifts from listeners including homemade masks and Matouks hot sauces, including Trinidad Scorpion sauce. Jordan: Rediscovering love of brisket and enjoying a meat coma.

Dan: Andy Daly's new album, Four More Sweaters, and new podcast, Bonanas for Bonanza, both released over the weekend. Jordan: Personal growth; transforming from a "giant shitbag" into a slightly less giant one.

Dan: Realizing chicken can be cooked in the oven. Jordan: Rediscovering the Redmask rendition of Dave Attell's Skanks for the Memories.
Dan: Bray Wyatt's return to WWE. Jordan: New giant beanbag couch that is extremely comfortable for sleeping.
Dan: Tools for shaving your back! Jordan: Jordan's wife getting her COVID booster and flu shot.

Dan: Back in the saddle, recording in person again after a root canal. Knowledge Fight shows all sold out, with more tickets added in Boston. Jordan: Wife stood up to professional bullies in a spectacular and stirring fashion.

Dan: The Boston show at the Middle East has sold out. Teared up listening to the Bosstones 'Live from the Middle East'. Jordan: Torrenting music to rebuild a lost collection and reclaim ownership. Listening to The Mars Volta album, 'De-loused in the Comatorium', and revisiting the drumming complexities.
Dan: Creditors voted for liquidation in Alex's bankruptcy hearing. Could be an opportunity to acquire infowars.com. Jordan: The character Iroh in Avatar: The Last Airbender.
Dan: Will be putting a new post on stackies.substack.com on March 1st. Jordan: The weather is nice outside. It's almost 60 degrees and bright and sunny.

Dan: That it's now freezing in Chicago, Jordan: Finally playing Final Fantasy VII Rebirth, [https://youtu.be/67sollJcWE4?si=CxRbzG0bW2Uq2b0a Being a guest on the On Brand podcast to analyze comedy]
Dan: Got the Stackies Substack back up and running. Jordan: Went to a movie theater for the first time in five years, to see Dune

Dan: Learning that Tanager George, the artist who created a very detailed drawing of Chicago from the air, is a fan of Knowledge Fight. Jordan: Fostering/dog-sitting two Westie puppies and a third dog, despite the challenges of caring for them, especially since one dog has liver problems and eats scrambled eggs every night.
Dan: Trying the KFC Chizza (chicken pizza): it was fine, Jordan: Playing Final Fantasy VII Rebirth
Dan: Not a bright spot, but a call-out: Unicorn-i-licious Haribos. Cotton candy flavor a definite pass. Jordan: Wife's mom picked up three of the puppies. The two remaining are less taxing.

Dan: Realizing wild meant 'grows wild' not 'cool'. Jordan: The Cure's new album is pretty good.

Dan: Putting 2024 in the past, looking forward to new year. Jordan: Had the best Christmas, and welcoming a new puppy, Sunny, to the family.

Jordan: Puppy joining the rest of the pack
